Field.Label: Enter a positive or negative number to offset the temperature by.

Field.Label: Net Energy: Energy usage will be shown as Energy Consumed - Energy Returned.
Consumed Energy: Energy usage will be shown as the total of Consumed Energy.
Returned Energy: Energy usage will be shown as the total of Returned Energy.
Net Energy: Energy usage will be shown as Energy Consumed - Energy Returned.
Consumed Energy: Energy usage will be shown as the total of Consumed Energy.
Returned Energy: Energy usage will be shown as the total of Returned Energy.
Invert:
Field.Description: Invert the reported value of the contact.
